attributes.action: Evacuate Vulnerable Families of British Afghan Citizens
attributes.additional_details: Tensions remain high as Britons speculate over influx of unknown refugees. Priority will address these as the refugees are immediate family members of British Citizens. British Afghans are angry at our Gov for abandoning Afg and their family. Prioritising will address this and avoid a lamentable decline of the integrity of Government. Currently councils are lobbying for resources. Prioritising will alleviate these stresses as Citizens will arrange resources for their relatives. Other reasons inc
attributes.background: Urgently evacuate and resettle the vulnerable immediate family members of British Afghans as a priority. We are Tax paying citizens; Taxes that fund our country including Defence budget and so including our mission in Afghanistan. We have played a meaningful, enabling roles and we deserve priority.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595839
